documents.document: @deceptiveaccent @enzogiordani Take it somewhere and trade it for brownies.
@NZ_Dave @JayHarvie It was more that the social teams didn't come back and the MCL team are too young to drink...
@NZ_Dave @JayHarvie Yeah, Mumby was saying Newtown 2 is back and he's really looking forward to the 4 games worth oâ€¦ https://t.co/GxtDx0cpH7
@NZ_Dave @JayHarvie From what I've heard (Sandy), the idea is that the girls play at 12 or 12:30 or something, withâ€¦ https://t.co/w2KqvS481a
@JayHarvie @NZ_Dave For Diamonds and SO, yeah. Maybe Rapa and PNM, but who cares about them? Seatoun and UH no goodâ€¦ https://t.co/IfntiNYxJ5
@EnzoGiordani @PhlClaytn It was a bloody good match, which really helped. :)
@patrick478 @Wimble_Wombat @gingereejit He'd better. @AliceCooke3 needs to get those yellow cards :)
@EnzoGiordani @PhlClaytn Nah, his club are still playing on Sundays. It might also mean more blogstering from me...â€¦ https://t.co/cHyYc2rJ1t
@Wimble_Wombat @patrick478 We never got Patrick last year. Just a few lines. I think we'll lose Selwyn. Not sure about the other ones.
@Wimble_Wombat I've only talked to Sandy about it, and she's for it. The refs is going to be fun. Unless we get @patrick478 all the time.
I, for one, am very pleased with this change (and the six team league). Looking forward to #WCL17. https://t.co/SSzH61TNR2
@jayharvie I walk past some WCC flats on the way home everyday and there's pretty much always smokers hanging out. No enforcement, no care.
@jayharvie Yeah, i know it's possible, and WCC are starting on it, it's just going to take a serious culture change here.
@jayharvie Do they do it like HK airport, with dedicated smoking rooms that are not pleasant to walk past as the door opens?
@jayharvie It's a great idea, I just don't really see it working.
@jayharvie It's unenforceable. And unless WCC have changed their tune, it says so in all the press releases.
My pics from @CU_Dragons' 4-1 #SSPremiership win over @WgtnPhoenixFC today: https://t.co/o23qsvS1hE #WPvCU https://t.co/Gl9O8X6TAZ

I managed it. Now I'll caption some random ones and upload them.
Actually, I wasn't the only media there. Photosport was there for half.
@yakcall Should have switched to the next tab. It's @matroidunion instead :)
@nzphotomac You mean like Qatar's air conditioned stadiums?
@yakcall It looks obnoxiously invasive. Here's my current screen.. https://t.co/FxuPhrQYIu
@yakcall I use Twitter on computer, phone, and website. So unfortunately I just need to block the crap out of peeps. Working pretty good atm
Can I be bothered editing the photos from the Weenix game? I was the only media there...
@yakcall I honestly have no idea. It'll probably depend on how Bill does. I just want it late so I can stay on Twitter longer :)
@yakcall I'm guessing as late as possible so they can bankrupt Labour with as many pointless by-elections as possible.
@yakcall Yeah, this trick only works with 2 parties. Though National are doing pretty good all by themselves at the moment...
@yakcall If Labour and the Greens played their cards correctly, they could clean up massively under MMP. Thankfully they don't.
@yakcall I know this is joke, but that sounds awesome. :P
@patrick478 Double point (the other cable is always down for maintenance when this happens), but yeah. Not enough redundancy...
@patrick478 It's 'wee' when their usual is "some dumbarse farmer put a digger through our cable"...
@patrick478 Still awesome if it's not actually beer? :P
#photochallenge2017 Week 4: Toys and Games (rule of thirds) https://t.co/7nnxxVYVXE
Tried to get @tacmoy to play beer pong. She sucked, even when she was dropping the ball...

@Yakcall Oh, I've blocked all the greens already. That's just a matter of principle :)
TBH, I'll probably just bail when that happens.
@Yakcall There's following, and then there's perpetual outrage and mockery. It's the latter I was sick of months ago and started blocking.
@Yakcall Most of mine showed up in RTs/quotes, so I blocked those accounts. Plus I follow basically no Americans...
@Yakcall Wow. That guy makes the Standard seem sensible.
@Yakcall Mine is pretty American Politics free. But my block list is very, very long...
@Yakcall That makes a little more sense. I looked her up. It's still fairly incoherent.
@Yakcall Does that say "Wank Paula Rebstock"?

@enzogiordani If only it was MySpace, then we could be Mutton.
I may be quite hungry...
Did Day 2 of my workout regime. At the end of it, I'm going to be a cross between The Rock and Usain Bolt.
@enzogiordani We should demand a special 'don't forget about the little man' button...
@enzogiordani Yup. It seems to be designed for large organisations that actually get messages. Not us nothing football fans.
@enzogiordani Yeah, I'm at 15. And I'm much newer than that...
@enzogiordani Regularly? I get few, so if I've got the button it means 'got a message in the last day or so'. I care a lot less than you...
@enzogiordani I think you need to get lots of first-time messages in order to keep it.
@NZPhotomac This might be relevant to your interests: https://t.co/fQuN68MOLS
@thekiwicanary Trying to justify your purchase of something green and yellow?
@jayharvie See, this is actually believable.
@JayHarvie So you can find a light switch. Well done, I guess.
Best part of this: No heritage advisors. https://t.co/tnnyfNPUhp
@yakcall Do you delete all your tweets on a regular basis so you can reuse jokes without anyone knowing?
@thejourneyfan It does. It's buried somewhere. I've never used it. More importantly, the AF play nice?
@thejourneyfan How was the camera?
@enzogiordani It's obviously all lies when you mentioned winning that coffee machine. The rest is believable.
Finally booked in my full license test. Just in time for a roadtrip as well.
@Yakcall Goals work good. Even in the wind today. Though they made my best shot of the day not a goal... https://t.co/6BiM4OXcqP
@deceptiveaccent It's in English Lit, right?
@thejourneyfan @nzphotomac I'm playing a game in about 30 minutes. In theory...
@alicecooke3 Compared to Tuesday, we did... But yeah, such is football. Â¯\_(ãƒ„)_/Â¯
@thekiwicanary In football, size isn't supposed to matter. In rugby, it does, especially when you're young.
@yakcall I lurk and lol. It's the only thing to do on the Internet.
@yakcall The FFA was right. That game in hand thing is really confusing for fans.
@thekiwicanary I think 1970 Marton was a slightly different place...
@thekiwicanary At that age it is. It's bloody hard to tackle a huge Islander. I know, I've done it.
@JonoNewton In his defence, travelling salesman is hard. Really, really hard.
@yakcall @enzogiordani And if you saw it every week, you'd get pretty bored of them pretty fast. Shooting enthralling photos be hard.
@enzogiordani @yakcall Easy way to break your neck, I guess. My kit is heaps lighter than that and I gave up on neck straps already...
@enzogiordani @yakcall Maybe. It's a totally different perspective, which is getting them more admiration.
@yakcall @enzogiordani They're bloody heavy (3.85kg lens with 1.34kg body + batteries). He wouldn't want to.
@enzogiordani @yakcall He's shooting through a grate. Worse than shooting through a chain-link fence...
@yakcall You mean the spooning photo?
@yakcall I mean, it's cool and all, it's just not overly special. Me knowing nothing about NFL probably doesn't help...
@yakcall Yeah, but it's the kind of photos you'd get from a drone. If you could somehow attach a bigarse lens to it...
@yakcall Yeah, I saw it. It's basically drone photography with $25k (and no idea of weight, but lots) of camera.
Selfie without self. #photochallenge2017 https://t.co/4C5WyyflzG
@enzogiordani @thekiwicanary Don't forget the most important part: that plastic bag...
@thejourneyfan Sweet. I'll bring you a 70D for TWs on Sunday.
@thejourneyfan I remembered all by myself! Going to be at the Phoenix on Saturday, and in your normal seat?
Or, @tacmoy has 5.6m of seat lying in the back yard that I'm going to mercilessly destroy over the weekend. I like this one better.
I'll have a go at it with a chainsaw over the weekend. Hopefully. Assuming I'm allowed to use the chainsaw...
Just measured. We have about 5.6m of tree lying in our back yard.
@patrick478 @NZPhotomac #12pubsoflochhead?
@JayHarvie Well, my tree decided to flop...
#WeatherBomb https://t.co/V1mbsZALnW
@thekiwicanary Matches?
@_mjwills Sounds good :)
@_mjwills No worries :) I'm not in that much of a hurry and my budget is relatively small...
@_mjwills Well, if you replied to your emails (I assume it was an email, I have no idea...)
@thekiwicanary The missus has the car. She's scared of a little wind and rain.
@JayHarvie No. This is the calm before the storm.
@thekiwicanary "nice" sea breeze. So I'm assuming you've had some weird alley surgical procedure to make your farts smell acceptable...
Though, if I do go, my monthly shower will be taken care of. Which is a plus.
@thekiwicanary Do you have a nice sea breeze as well?
I was planning on going on a run this evening. Guess that's not going to happen...
@thekiwicanary @Flickr You dodgy bastard, trying to hack my computer. https://t.co/CeOWiVRaXZ
@EnzoGiordani @patrick478 That sounds like a better idea than watching a Waikato team play football anyway :P
@EnzoGiordani Write a blog post bitching (so do that media trick and just grab @patrick478's tweets)
@EnzoGiordani who cares about you, does it come with camera protection? ðŸ˜€
